title: SAMSUNG 225 L Direct Cool Single Door 4 Star Refrigerator with Base Drawer with Digi Touch Cool, BSD  (Paradise BLUE, RR23A2F3X9U/HL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Unit Refrigerator, User Manual with Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor From Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Digi-Touch Cool: You can access fast and intuitive controls, thanks to the Digi-Touch Cool control panel that even alerts you about power outages as well as restores temperature loss. It also features an Eco Mode and a Door Alarm to help you save energy, an e-Defrost for effortless defrosting, and a Power Cool option to cool food and drinks in no time.
product_description.Digital Inverter Technology: This refrigerator comes with a Digital Inverter Technology that helps you save energy, functions without making noise, and lasts for a long time. Also, the compressor adjusts its speed automatically according to cooling demand.

review: Best in class top notch fridge. Cooling is very fast. The fridge comes with stabilizer free operation which is great advantage. The design and size is as expected and good. Ample amount of space for all your needs. Very happy to have it. Made available by Flipkart during this pandemic time. Thank you so much Flipkart.
Excellent performance. Design is superb. Ample space provided for all the items. Price is also good to buy this. Best refrigerator in in this price.

The product was delivered on time. Thanks to Flipkart. The product is quite silent, one would hardly notice the control panel in front no need to open and change ur cooling mode you can easily control in digital colpad, the start and stop of the compressor. The cooling is quite fast and steady. Great to keep ice-creams and cold drinks. The storage space is also quite sufficient. Overall an excellent product....!!!

We have been using this refrigerator for the past 30 days. Below are our pros and cons.

Pros:
1) Cooling capacity is good.
2) Silent in operation compared to our earlier 10 year old whirlpool refrigerator
3) Outside control is very convenient
4) Looks elegant
5) Back side of the refrigerator is closed to the maximum extent
6) No need to buy separate stand
7) Delivery is on time.

Cons:
1) Defrosting water collection tray is smaller.
2) Side faces of refrigerator is getting hot sometimes. As I heard from others, it is quite normal for the refrigerator.
This product is very good and service delivery is very fast and delivery boy behaviour very good I am happy for this product

First I thought blue colour would be good but after I bought this colour looks much better. It look way better than in picture and the performance also very good . digi touch feature is very easy and usefull .blindly go for it.
One of the best product this range ☺️ gys I suggest under 20000 thousand best product , but this very quickly hot right side and left side . But I love it ❤️
I love cooling system and new experience and new generation looking , and love digi touch screen. I just love colour and new look and performance. 💖💖💖💖💖
Looks great, will use the same for next couple of days and post full review
